snippet.title: The Blind Prophet - Launch trailer
snippet.description:
The Blind Prophet is a Point 'n' Click adventure and narrative game. Explore the corrupted city of Rotbork, and brave the Great Evil that lurks within.
Gameplay trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mtU2kqCBx_8

AVAILABLE NOW on Steam & GOG:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/968370?
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/the_blind_prophet

Find us on our social medias:
https://www.facebook.com/theblindprop...
https://twitter.com/ArsGoetiaGames
https://www.instagram.com/arsgoetiagames/
